availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Barnett Baird (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, judge and hotel keeper)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, judge and hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Sallie M. Barnett Baird on December 24, 1844. Father of Sally M. Baird, Laura Baird, Clinton T. Baird, Naomi Baird, Prudence Baird, Alexander Baird. Elected as county judge in Ohio County Court in 1854. Judge in Ohio County Court from 1854 to 1861. Hotel keeper in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 787.
Find A Grave, "A. B. Baird (February 12, 1821-May 26, 1892)," Memorial #32065367, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/32065367 (accessed January X, 2019).
